EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_PCF_Announce_Q417.PCF 2.0 Announce 12-12-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Any App. Every Cloud. One Platform.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
August 2, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars]]> Learn How to Operationalize IoT Applications on Pivotal Cloud Foundry Chris Rawles and Jeff Kelly, pivotal August 15, 2017 11:00am PDT / 2:00Pm EDT
Join Pivotal Data Scientist Chris Rawles, as he illustrates how to build and operationalize an Internet of Things (IoT) application running on Pivotal Cloud Foundry, that scores and reacts to streaming data in real-time. In this webinar you will learn how to:
- Collect streaming IoT data - Build and train machine learning models in real-time - Score streaming data in real-time in an application
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/aug-15-learn-how-to-operationalize-iot-apps-on-pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinar]]>
